Issue.creator: caod
Issue.summary: Add defaults to collection config maxPeerCount and requiredPeerCount properties
Issue.description: As part of FAB-17303, we're deciding on adding defaults for the `maxPeerCount` and `requiredPeerCount` values for implicit collections if not specified. Specifically `maxPeerCount: 1` and `requiredPeerCount: 0`. This issue tracks the other side for explicit collection definition configs.
